article_title: Insurance office opens Walmart location for Obamacare help
article_text:
By Michael D. Abernethy / Times-News

Posted Oct. 9, 2013 at 12:01 AM

Updated Oct 9, 2013 at 6:41 PM

article_metadata.description: A local insurance agency is running a help center to answer questions about the Affordable Care Act and enroll people in insurance plans under the new law.    	The new Blue Cross and Blue Shield of North Carolina office inside the Walmart on Graham-Hopedale Road is one of only nine such centers in the state. Don Allred Insurance, of Burlington, is staffing it.    	The office is open in the evenings and on weekends, to accommodate working hours.    	The goal is to help people understand the law
article_metadata.author: Michael D. Abernethy / Times-News
